LanguageData.ProblemHackerWarningLetterText: A word of warning garbled over the radio, apparently someone has extorted {0} after successfully hacking their electronics!
LanguageData.ProblemHackerExtortionLetterText: Pay {0} a total of 100 silver or you will regret it.\n\n -{1}, Hacker Extraordinaire
LanguageData.ProblemHackerHackedLetterText: Several of your turrets have been hacked and are now firing on anything they can. With luck, the hacking signal can only be sent so long ...
LanguageData.ProblemHackerHackingEndedLetterText: Just as suddenly as the chaos erupted, the hacked turrets are now back under your control.
LanguageData.ProblemHackerTracedLetterText: With the quick work and dedication of {0}, the location of the hacker has been found.
LanguageData.ProblemHackerCountermeasuresActiveLetter: With a little hard work and a lot of time, countermeasures have now been implemented against the hacking

Inform them about the hacker's location
LanguageData.ProblemHackerExtortionDemandsText: Unless you wish to end up like {0}, cough up {2} silver. Remember, it'll do no good to you if you're dead ...\n\n{1} -Hacker Extraordinaire
LanguageData.ProblemHackerExtortionDemandsTextNoAllie: Unless you wish to end up like all the suckers around here, cough up {1} silver. Remember, it'll do no good to you if you're dead ...\n\n{0} -Hacker Extraordinaire
LanguageData.ProblemHackerDialogOptionText_ExtortionR: "Go play with your turrets and leave the adults alone {0}, unless you want to get hurt."
LanguageData.ProblemHackerHackedAllyBaseOption_AskFor: Ask for information about the hacker
LanguageData.ProblemHackerInvestigateHackingLetterTex: {0} has investigated the hacking, earning valuable insight towards the development of countermeasures.
LanguageData.PH_WCA_LetterText: A faint communication is inbound on the comms console
LanguageData.PH_WCA_RootText0: URGENT WARNING! This is {0} to all surrounding settlements. An individual named {1} has succeeded in hacking our systems using local radio signals, turning our defenses against ourselves! We are searching the area for them, but request any assistance that can be provided! Urgent warning!
LanguageData.PH_WCA_RootText1: Our communications systems are damaged and cannot be used reliably. An individual named {1} has succeeded in hacking our systems using local radio signals, we urge you to disable your turrets if possible! We repeat, an individual named {1} has succeeded in hacking our systems using local radio signals, we urge you to disable turrets if possible
LanguageData.PH_HackedAllyFC_ParentText: As another matter, we have lost contact with our base {0}, and was wondering if you had heard anything?
LanguageData.PH_HackedAllyFC_ParentOption: Advise {0} that you have heard nothing from {1}
